-
English Translation from Reddit:

On Wednesday evening, the first case of coronavirus infection in Estonia was confirmed, confirmed social minister Tanel Kiik. The Estonian health service stated, that a press conference on the matter would be held soon.

"I'll have to mention, that (today) Thursday morning we just received information, that the first infection has been discovered," stated Kiik on Thursdays "Terevisioon" morning talkshow. He says a person who had arrived to Estonia on Wednesday evening was diagnosed with it.

Kiik specified that it's a native Estonian resident of Iranian origin, and that they'd arrived back to Estonia by a bus from Riga. Currently the minister says that they're working on figuring out who the other people on the bus were and they'll be contacting them. The infected person has been isolated and is currently being taken care of in the hospital.

The Estonian health agency confirmed to Delfi that the first case of infection was discovered. Additional information will soon be provided at the press conference.

replies.msg:
Estonia's first positive case of Coronavirus was found overnight Wednesday and Thursday after an individual who suspected he might have contracted the virus called an ambulance after arriving in Tallinn by bus from Riga. The man, a 34-year-old Iranian national resident in Estonia, according to reports, had flown in to Riga from Istanbul, Turkey, with his daughter, transferring by minibus to the bus station, and had previously been in contact with a relative who had contracted the virus. He is currently being held in the infectious diseases clinic at the West Tallinn Central Hospital (Lääne Tallinna Keskhaigla).

Ambulance chief: Coronavirus call-outs putting pressure on service
https://news.err.ee/1057946/ambulance-chief-coronavirus-call-outs-putting-pressure-on-service
